article_title: Coronavirus: US 'wants 3M to end mask exports to Canada and Latin America'
article_description: Mask manufacturer 3M says the move would have  significant humanitarian implications
article_content: Image copyrightReuters A major US mask manufacturer  3M  says the government has asked it to stop exporting US made N95 respirator masks to Canada and Latin America The request had  significant humanitarian implications  it warned  and could prompt other    2329 chars
